author: Krillr Labs <aaron@krillr.com>
description: clientside data model system inspired by mongodb and the django orm, with offline storage support.
name: sonrai

scripts.prepublish: cd src/; cat sonrai.coffee events.coffee errors.coffee utils.coffee databases/base.coffee databases/memory.coffee databases/localstorage.coffee model.coffee query.coffee fields.coffee package.coffee > sonrai-bundle.coffee; coffee -bo ../ -c sonrai-bundle.coffee
